Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of *The Incredibles*?
Options:
A. a) Brad Bird pitched his story idea for *The Incredibles* to John Lasseter at Pixar.
B. b) *The Incredibles* was directed by Brad Bird.
C. c) Pixar was involved in the production of *The Incredibles*.
D. d) Brad Bird had previously directed *Toy Story*.
Answer: a) Brad Bird pitched his story idea for *The Incredibles* to John Lasseter at Pixar., b) *The Incredibles* was directed by Brad Bird., c) Pixar was involved in the production of *The Incredibles*.

B. Brad Bird directed and co-wrote the screenplay for *The Incredibles*.
C. The Incredibles was released in 2004.

Answer: All of the above

Answer: a) The Incredibles was produced using computer animation. b) Brad Bird initially developed his superhero story idea in the early 1990s. c) The Incredibles was originally planned to be a 2D cel animation.
